website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable and sensitive, this well-received contender is a popular choice among medical professionals.
cons: Some issues with murmurs and bruits

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for nursing school. I have a littmann but since our stethoscopes tend to "walk off" I didn't want to risk a $100 scope disappearing on me. I bought this for a cheaper substitute and I must say I am IMPRESSED. The sound is almost equal to my Littmann, very comfortable to wear especially in my ears, I can hear breath sounds, and rhythm in heavier patients with ease. I would definitely reccomend this for nursing or med students, or anyone that needs a quick replacement (you might fall in love). Plus free parts for life and a life time warranty? Who can beat that?!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Riley

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome. Tried a co workers MDF and ordered one ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been converted after a decade of the 'other brand' stethoscope. I can hear everything! It's awesome. Tried a co workers MDF and ordered one that night. Excellent quality too. Speedy delivery. I have not one negative thing to say. It's just a wonderful product that I am excited to have found!
customer_reviews.author: C. Boyer

customer_reviews.title: A MUST!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best stethoscope! Side note: I had a littmann cardiology prior to this and would have trouble hearing with it. It broke in half (LITERALLY) and I was in the market for a new one. A coworker recommended the MDF as she had just purchased one. I tried hers out and was SOLD! I can hear SO much better with this one! At least 5 other coworkers have also recently purchased one because we love ours so much! Highly recommend! Lots of different color combos, hearing quality is next level and let's not forget the price is awesome as well!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Mae

customer_reviews.title: Great stethoscope
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome stethoscope....I used it for the first time today after my old Littman died. I'm very happy with it. I was originally intending to purchase another Littman but I'm very happy I took a chance to get the MDF....totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Best one I have had yet
customer_reviews.text: I finally can hear lungs, heart and bowel sounds. Best one I have had yet!!
customer_reviews.author: MI

customer_reviews.title: Superior to Littman in my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: I love MDF stethoscopes. I bought my first one because I misplaced my Littman during a move. I was shocked that the sound quality was far superior and I liked it so much better than the Littman I had begged for as my nursing school graduation present. So much more affordable too. I will continue to buy MDF products.
customer_reviews.author: BSRN

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Really like this one. Had a Littmann Lightweight SE II before and this one has superior sound quality for pressures and breath sounds. I work as an EMT and it’s really durable, can keep it in my pocket no problem without fear of the diaphragm getting damaged. Also came with different size ear pieces for me to put on for the best fit. Excellent stethoscope, great quality. Recommend for anyone wanting an upgrade from their stock stethoscopes. Will definitely be sticking with this company
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Piana

customer_reviews.title: Great sound & comfortable style
customer_reviews.text: The style is nice and flexible. Comfortable on the ears. Light weight but doesn’t feel cheap! The sound is really good. I use this stethoscope for 45 blood pressures a day and it’s been good so far. But only thing I can complain about is When I opened the package I thought the ear pieces were dirty but they just collect lint easily, I disinfected them and same thing happens... it kind of looks dirty... I included a picture of the ear pieces after just sitting on my wall at work.... other than that, the stethoscope is a nice buy.
customer_reviews.author: Faith 🖤

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stethoscope
customer_reviews.text: I owned a Littman before and don’t see me going back. In my opinion this does the same thing. As long as I can hear some lung sounds and a pulse, it works for me. After about a year the original set of ear buds ripped, but that’s from having it in my backpack. Case includes 2 extra sets, name tag, and a bell cover. I will continue to recommend this product when someone ask me what stethoscope to buy.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and functional
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use in measuring my blood pressure. It feels solid and sturdy and appears to be well made. The ear pieces are comfortable in my ears (it comes with a few rubber slip-on ear pieces of different sizes), unlike the stethoscope in a one-piece sphygmomanometer kit from another maker that I bought.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: MDF nurse for life
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want a Littman, and MDF was recommended by quite a few people. I love it. Just as good for nearly half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been using stethoscopes for 40 years. I was reluctant to purchase this brand, thinking the quality might be poor. I was surprisingly pleased with the quality, especially the sound quality. Very pleased! I will purchase again and recommend to my colleagues. Happy Family Nurse Practitioner
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best scope ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first stethoscope and I can hear EVERYTHING! As a new Medical Assistant who hasn't done a blood pressure more than 3 times over 25 years ago and struggled with it then, I cannot miss a perfect pressure. Clear as a bell!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Brumfield

customer_reviews.title: Light but good
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use as a spare. I like it better than my littman.
customer_reviews.author: Sam G.

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this stethoscope. I’m a CMA student and thought this was going to be prefect. Unfortunately I can’t not hear ANYTHING out of it. Had a hard time trying to take manual blood pressure and opt out for my cheaper stethoscope because I could hear out of it. I’m returning this one and maybe I’ll revisit once I get accepted into nursing school. It’s just not right for me. Love the make and it seem like it was going to be very durable. I’d say if you can hear out of it, it’ll be a good choice!
customer_reviews.author: Jonel

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I have Been in nursing for almost 10 years have tried many stethoscopes. This is by far one of the best i have used. Even compared to some littmans, the sound is much better. I think I found my new favorite brand!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: Keep shopping too expensive to be so cheap
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and pulls out of my ears from the weight, the rubber is not flexible, and the piece spins so bad you can’t just have it on peds or adult.
customer_reviews.author: Kassidy D.

customer_reviews.title: Keep buying
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of MDF’s. I wouldn’t buy any other brand besides these. Only negative is that the ear pieces are not that durable. Have to order a pair every year.
customer_reviews.author: James Abram

customer_reviews.title: Call me Mr MD
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, I went by the reviews, I dont know one from the other, just need an accurate way of keeping up with my Blood pressure, but this is nice, I even look smarter wearing it. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Wedig

customer_reviews.title: I love this stethoscope
customer_reviews.text: I love this stethoscope. I ordered it in solid black after and friend recommended it to me. I get compliments on it all the time and everyone knows that its mine. I also have a Littmann Classic 3 and I never use it. It sits on my desk at home and collects dust. The MDF, at least this model, is far superior to Littmann
customer_reviews.author: Randell D. Poole

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: This stethoscope is nicely built, and provides great sound. It is a bit heavier than littmann classic III but it's not a problem rather than a Plus to me. Makes it feel nice in your hand. Plus you can't beat the free lifetime warranty...
customer_reviews.author: Ruslan

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Can’t hear breath sounds through clothes and you can only hear them faintly with direct skin contact but great for practically everything else. Gets scratched up a little but still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: PurseJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I've had this stethoscope for a little over a month now, and so far so good. I bought it to use until I can get my Littman retubed. The sound quality is good. I may end up saving my money and not retubing my Littman.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Acoustics are nothing special. Littman is better.
customer_reviews.text: I am a veterinarian and I use this for my physicals for dogs and cats. I previously had a Littman Cardiology II, and while this MDF model is not of the same level I don't find the acoustics especially good.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bencuya

customer_reviews.title: The folks who bought from other manufactures love to borrow my MDF MD One
customer_reviews.text: The folks who bought from other manufactures love to borrow my MDF MD One... this is a stellar stethoscope. Great for a nursing student and beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Edd Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my stethoscope! It works great, and I love the fact it has warranty for life!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed customer!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed with my purchase I am in school and wanted t I'll invest in a good stethoscope only yo recieved best up not even with in another box for protection. And when I opened it ...it was dirty and dusty!!!!I am super disappointed and very upset!!!!! I will be returning it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: miriam silva

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Did not even last a year, with minimal use. The bell fell apart, unable to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice steth
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Used for work. Keep an eye on it. It grows legs alot
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t really hear
customer_reviews.text: Don’t want to say this is a bad product, but I had issues with being able to hear. Trying to take a blood pressure I would hear more of the BP cuff Velcro more than the actual heartbeat. For school and quick non emergent vitals it will do it’s job.
customer_reviews.author: JSIMMONS

customer_reviews.title: I can hear better through this than my $300 litman
customer_reviews.text: I can hear better through this than my $300 litman. The quality of the rubber is thick and non pliable. It’s also heavy and feels cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this stethoscope for the money. It's a little on the heavy side but I don't wear it around my neck so I dont care. But I can hear great with it.
customer_reviews.author: meredith weaver

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and low cost.
customer_reviews.text: Great, but the bel is heavy. No other issues. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kruby

customer_reviews.title: Not for music
customer_reviews.text: Works great if you want to hear heart rate/breathing. Unfortunately not compatible with iPhone so am unable to hear my music. Guess I’ll just listen to my heart rate all day
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! I can hear perfectly I recommend it to everyone in my classes and I love that it come with so many earbuds!! Definitely should buy!
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stethoscope
customer_reviews.text: I have a Littman cardiology II that has been fine. I needed an extra stethoscope for nursing home rounds and the like. I can't really appreciate any real difference between the MDF and my Littman. A new Littman is much more expensive then this new MDF. I am very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent look and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I took a cna class while finishing my pre-reqs for my bsn and needed one for both. Works excellent. Everyone kept wanting to borrow mine. Even ones with Littmann. Loved the look and quality. Very comfortable to wear. A little heavy but not bad. Worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wilmoth

customer_reviews.title: Great stethoscope for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great stethoscope! It's best to get a dark color like black or navy. I have the coral color as well and my grey shrubs discolored it so badly that they sent me replacement tubing. Love the lifetime warranty though. It has great sound for such an inexpensive stethoscope
customer_reviews.author: karapg

customer_reviews.title: Good stethoscope
customer_reviews.text: I'm a medical student and these seem to suit me fine for my needs so far. The steths they give us for school are fairly subpar; these are much more effective and sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Kara A. Harper

customer_reviews.title: RECEIVED A USED ONE!! NOT HAPPY AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive my new stethoscope and try it out but I couldn't even do that, when I opened the box the ear pieces were DISGUSTING, seemed as if it had been used! I'm sending it back!! VERY DISAPPOINTING!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Juarez

customer_reviews.title: For the price this is a very good scope. It is a bit heavy and for ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a very good scope. It is a bit heavy and for that reason I went back to littmann. But this is my back up that I keep at work in case I forget my work bag at home.
customer_reviews.author: WalkerRN

customer_reviews.title: I love this stethoscope
customer_reviews.text: I love this stethoscope. Before this, I had Littman Classic III, and I bought that because the brand is so well known. Then, the tubing broke on that so I decided to try this MDF. I got the all black one, and I love how it looks. I also think that it works better than the Littman. With my Littman, I could hear a lot of rustling noises if I didn't keep my hand completely still, which would make it hard to hear the heart sounds. With the MDF, it seems like there is less rustling noises, and the heart sounds are much clearer. And the MDF is cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: MDF All Black
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money! I use to have the MDF rose gold and white but it would get pen marks on the tubing and it bothered me. So, I opted for all black. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: The Ear Piece is Junk  Customer service is worse
customer_reviews.text: The ear Piece is Junk. Was torn after one year of use. Customer service did respond to several calls. It took them 10 days to replace it with non original parts.
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful piece. A very high quality feel
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful piece. A very high quality feel. The sound is no different from the littman classic III. The packaging is almost the same. The materials are very durable the colour seems to have been pouder coated so it doesn't flake or fade. I would again
customer_reviews.author: marlon

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: Great item for our son in year #2 of medical school.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tausch

customer_reviews.title: I hear everything
customer_reviews.text: RN 10 years. Best stethoscope I've ever used. I can hear so much better with this than I could my other expensive stethoscope. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: lee kramer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Have been using stethescopes for 50 years. This is one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: n spieler

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: good acoustics, sturdy and comfortable in fit. love the lifetime warranty and lifetime parts. I have always used Littmann, however this may be a game changer.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece of equipment, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I'm just getting started in the emergency medicine field (taking my first EMT class) and I needed to buy my own stethoscope. I did a good bit of research before selecting this one and found it to be the best compromise between price and quality. It seems very well built and durable, the chest piece easily flips between adult and pediatric, and it is very loud and clear. Most reviews I've read claim that it's as good or better than the more expensive Littman Classic III and after comparing it to some of my classmates Littman's I would agree. I doubt you can find a better stethoscope for less money.
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this at the hospital everyday. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: William J Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love that it was almost $100 cheaper then the Littmann stethoscopes. So far from what I have done it is great and I’m looking forward to using it during nursing school. The lifetime parts warranty can’t be beat
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: Good for the value
customer_reviews.text: Good stethoscope. A little heavy, coming from a lightweight Littman II. But does the job it needs to do.
customer_reviews.author: shoe diva

customer_reviews.title: Huhh, WHAT ??
customer_reviews.text: My hearing isn't bad enough for a braille stethoscope-----yet. I can actually hear heart sounds with this one.
customer_reviews.author: george s. burnett

customer_reviews.title: Tubing extremely stiff
customer_reviews.text: Able to hear heart and breath sounds great, but the tubing is so stiff and stuck in a u shape- almost un-usable. Need to check process for new tubing.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great stethoscope!
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with MDF. This is my second stethoscope from them and I love it. I can hear breath sounds easily and clearly. I also love the warranty plan! The price, you can't beat it. I highly recommend MDF stethoscopes.
customer_reviews.author: S Conway

customer_reviews.title: The best stethoscope I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: The best stethoscope I've ever used. Whenever I need a new one it will definitely be MDF. The physician I worked with even had me order the same one for him as he liked it just as much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very solid and made well. All black is a good look
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: It is so sensitive and i love being able tomuse it on the squad without struggling to hear.
customer_reviews.author: David Szabo

customer_reviews.title: Quality without the Price
customer_reviews.text: I am currently in EMT school in NJ, and was looking for something that had the quality of a Littmann without the cost, and although I've only had it a few weeks, I think that I can say that this nailed what I was looking for. For about $60 this has clear crisp sound when trying to obtain a BP or chest sounds. Plus I no longer need to use the loners from the Academy (gross).
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: good sound for the money
customer_reviews.text: the head rotates too easily so it accidentally changes from diaphragm to bell on a regular basis. Good for occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of this stethoscope is great, better than the Classic ii I had a few years ago. The stethoscope did arrive dirty and having fingerprints on it, giving the appearance that it was used.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The difference between this stethoscope and others is extreme. Incredible sound and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace one that "grew legs". Comfortable and works as expected for a paramedic.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Katz

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a friend, she loves them. Wears them every day.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Nice case, comes with different parts. Great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Pfaff

customer_reviews.title: Great instrument.
customer_reviews.text: You can hear really well and i like that I have a warranty if something happens to it.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality but quiet
customer_reviews.text: When I still wasn't that familiar with heart and lung sounds I thought this stethoscope was the bomb. Now that I am much more educated and have used coworkers stethoscopes I'm not very pleased with the sound quality at all. This stethoscope is very quiet compared to a classic littman.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: item is very heavy to use but does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nursing student stethscope
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pair for my wife who is in nursing school. She loves them. They seem to be of solid quality. This brand specifically seemed to have great reviews and I can see why.
customer_reviews.author: K. Siler

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Decent stethoscope. The key is getting the right size earpieces in it.
customer_reviews.author: Carris J Toothman

customer_reviews.title: Seems decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It looks solid, sound quality seems pretty good. I'm actually sending this as a present overseas to a friend and think he will enjoy this stethoscope compared to the cheaper versions.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price!! I'd say as good as littman
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stethoscope. I have used littman since I graduated ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stethoscope. I have used littman since I graduated nursing school and the sound quality with my MDF is just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It sounds as good to me as a litman cardiology at less than ...
customer_reviews.text: It sounds as good to me as a litman cardiology at less than the litman price. I bought a second one so i could keep one in my flight suit and the other for my ground ems job.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G Hall

customer_reviews.title: Benefits are worth the purchase, price is decent
customer_reviews.text: Excited about the lifetime warranty and will purchase another in the future
customer_reviews.author: lia Pauline

customer_reviews.title: He has been very happy with its performance at work and likes the all ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have, previously always, used Littmanns. Actually, when buying his Christmas present I saw this in all black and thought I had ordered a Littmann until it arrived. He thought about returning it for his fav namebrand, but we used it to assess our kids and read some reviews. He has been very happy with its performance at work and likes the all black color. I almost bought the gold, but I was worried about it turning colors. I really liked that this came with all the different, more comfortable, ear pieces. I always have trouble with my ears hurting with some stethescopes
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great stethoscope
customer_reviews.text: Hell everyone, after doing some research, I found that this product (MDF One stethoscope) was the best one for my interests. I wanted a high quality instrument that would not only offer great sounds of the heart (comparable to the more pricier ones) but would not break my bank. This is the perfect product for me at this time and you can't go wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joaquin Guillen

customer_reviews.title: Lub-dub
customer_reviews.text: Great stethoscope for the money. My son needed this for work and seems very pleased. Efficient shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stethoscope with a longer tube
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stethoscope with a longer tube, which really helps on auscultation of larger dogs. The price was right and I especially like the lifetime warranty and free parts.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: stethascope
customer_reviews.text: it is a little heavy but can hear lung sounds very well.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R. Friesen

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: I'm a nurse on a cardiac unit and I really like this stethoscope. I can hear clearly and the color is sleek. I'm not the biggest fan of the earpieces. They're really soft, but I plan on contacting the company for different ones.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA GREEN

customer_reviews.title: Functional and cool looking stethoscope
customer_reviews.text: Great stethoscope, and the totally black version looks very cool. It works for my purposes just as well as my Littman, and I don't have to worry about losing a lot of money if I ever have to replace it. One of the docs at work continually "forgets" a stethoscope (how does that happen?) and always asks to use mine over the cheap ones the hospital provides. I'm not really into communal use of anything, so I must always decline. I love it and use it daily!
customer_reviews.author: Louella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter after lot of comparison. It is great
customer_reviews.author: Ra aP

customer_reviews.title: My first stethoscope!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my LPN nursing program and thus far I can hear good with them. It comes in good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Irma Torres

customer_reviews.title: Ripped off
customer_reviews.text: Defective on arrival and used. Feels cheaply made of plastic, not stainless steel. Might of got a knock off. Seems Amazon is becoming famous for this.
customer_reviews.author: Atlas

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as my littman it replaced
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as my littman it replaced. Heavier with slightly worse sound quality. Free replacement parts are quite a nice perk. Will continue to use but when it's time for a replacement I will look around for other options.
customer_reviews.author: Evildounut

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love my MDF Stethoscope..it heavy enough that it feels professional & not like it belongs to Doctor McStuffen..Would definitely by another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stethoscope
customer_reviews.text: Love this stethoscope! Actially like it better than the other leading brand. A must buy especially for the price. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I needed a stethoscope for school, listened to at ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a stethoscope for school, listened to at the scrub store before buying. Sounds are clear and much cheaper in price than a littman. Will update if any issues occur.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Respiratory Therapist APPROVED!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome stethoscope, worth every penny. Listening to breath sounds with this stethoscope is super easy. This stethoscope is better than the expensive Littmann stethoscope. if you have trouble hearing breath sounds with the Littmann stethoscope, i recommend you get this stethoscope. The stethoscope has a life time warranty of free parts replacements. Respiratory Therapist APPROVED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer12

customer_reviews.title: Nursing requirement
customer_reviews.text: Got this for nursing school. I have the MDF 747 dual head and I use it at work. Can't wait to use this one in my studies
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Dugas

customer_reviews.title: Excellente!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can hear much better and clear. Affordable price with the supreme quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Young-Mi Choi

customer_reviews.title: Great Stethoscope for just starting out!
customer_reviews.text: I'm just getting started in my nursing career and this product has been great to use. A lot better than my first stethoscope. I can hear everything. Great deal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I love this stethoscope
customer_reviews.text: I love this stethoscope. It is so much better than the Littman with the triangle head I had previously. Lung sounds have never been clearer.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great stethoscope. Just as good as my Littmann
customer_reviews.text: Great stethoscope. Just as good as my Littmann. Clear sound. Very durable. I use it as my daily driver. No complaints yet. Happy that it doesn't wander off like my Littmann.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: It certainly isn't a top of the line one that would cost hundreds but for my med surge job it works great. I would say it is def
customer_reviews.text: The instrument works as advertised. It certainly isn't a top of the line one that would cost hundreds but for my med surge job it works great. I would say it is definitely better than a Littman for the same price. 5/5 stars for the money. 4/5 stars comparing it to all stethoscopes.
customer_reviews.author: The Faja

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for college classes and first time users. Great cost for the quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used this stethoscope for a week at work. It works better than my Littman does. I can hear lungs a lot better. Even on people with a little more cushion. It is a little heavier and stiffer than the Littman, but well worth dealing with considering I can hear better. I had a Dr. use it after intubating someone and he was impressed with it's sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: AllyD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and just as it was described! Very happy with this product! I bought this for my son who is in the Army and he is very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Broadhurst

customer_reviews.title: Really good product. I have used many stethoscopes during my ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. I have used many stethoscopes during my nursing school days and it doesn't sound as good as this one. AND it's only half the price of a littman!
customer_reviews.author: Be Jule d

product_meta.title: MDF Instruments MD One Stainless Steel Premium Dual Head Stethoscope - Free-Parts-for-Life & Lifetime Warranty (MDF777-BO) - All Black
product_meta.description: Color:All BlackHandcrafted Since 1971 | Lifetime Warranty | Free-Parts-for-Life Program | Latex Free Constructed from acoustically-superior stainless steel, the MDF MD One Stethoscope delivers accurate auscultation of heart, lung, and Korotkoff sounds with acoustic integrity and clarity. An ergonomic design ensures comfort for the doctor and patient, even during extended use. The MD One is a premier diagnostic instrument with unmatched performance, durability, and aesthetics. Chestpiece: The handcrafted stainless steel dual-head chestpiece is precisely machined and hand polished for the highest performance and durability. The full-rotation acoustic valve stem with green indicator dot allows the user to easily identify the active sound channel and seals in sound. Acoustic Tubing: Constructed of thicker, denser, latex-free PVC, the Y-configuration non-stick acoustic tubing provides insulation for superior sound transmission and seals out ambient noise while preventing the cracking and wearing that can occur from repeated use. The longer-than-average length allows a comfortable space between health professional and patient. Acoustic Pyramid Chamber: A patented internal metal-alloy chamber located in the acoustic tubing below the spring keeps the tubing channel open for maximum sound transmission into the headset. ErgonoMax Headset:Hand polished, pre-angled stainless steel headset features a patented internal dual-leaf spring construction for durability and custom fit. Soft silicone ComfortSeal eartips (available in standard and small sizes) are clear for hygienic purposes and conform to the ear to seal out extraneous noise while ensuring comfort during extended use. Patented SafetyLock eartip adaptors lead the industry in user safety. Included Accessories: 2 extra sets ComfortSeal eartips, spare ultrasensitive diaphragm, and ID tag.
feature_bullets: Handcrafted Since 1971 | Free-parts-for-life Program | Lifetime Warranty | Latex-free |
100% stainless steel construction and acoustically-superior stainless steel
Includes 3 pairs of MDF ComfortSeal eartips: Small, Regular, and Large. Eartips are included in our Free-parts-for-life Program
SECURED TWICE Dual-leaf spring construction offers twice the durability
PREVENT PUNCTURED EAR DRUMS Patented SafetyLock Eartip Adaptors are non-invasive and leads the industry in user safety
